page.title: 06COMMUNICATION
page.content: THERE ARE TWO FORMS OF COMMUNICATION ONE IS THE POST AND THE OTHER THE TEEPHONE.THE POST OFFICE MAKE ONE DELIVERY A DAY IN THE MORNING,THERE ARE TWO COLLECTIONS A DAY ONE IN THE MORNING THE OTHER IN THE AFTERNOON.THE COLLECTION POINTS ARE SMALL RED BOXES FIXED TO TELEPHONE POLES OR MOUNTED IN WALLS.THERE ARE THREE BOXES IN THIS AREA ONE IN GRID REF 45,28 ALSO ONE AT 46,26 AND A BOX IN THE WALL OF THE SHOP AT LANGICK 48,26.THERE ARE TWO TELEPHONE KIOSKS IN THE AREA ONE IN BROTHERTOFT BY THE HALL GRID REF46,27 AND ONE BY THE OLD SCHOOL AGAIN IN BROTHERTOFT REF 46,26 ,THESE ARE COIN OPERATED TELEPHONES AND WHEN FULL ARE CLEARED BY THE POST OFFICE EVEN THOUGH THEY ARE OWNED BY BRITISH TELECOM.
